meanings.definition: A man who engages in numerous casual sexual relationships with women.
meanings.sent1: The womanizer at the bar was always surrounded by women.
meanings.sent2: He gained a reputation as a womanizer due to his many short-term relationships.
meanings.sent3: The womanizer thought he was a real catch, but the women saw through his act.
meanings.sent4: His friends jokingly called him a womanizer, but he just enjoyed meeting new people.
meanings.sent5: The womanizer's little black book was filled with names and numbers.

meanings.definition: A person who habitually flirts with or seduces women.
meanings.sent1: She saw him as a charming womanizer who knew all the right things to say.
meanings.sent2: The womanizer's smooth talk always seemed to work on the ladies.
meanings.sent3: Despite his reputation as a womanizer, he was actually quite shy around women.
meanings.sent4: The womanizer's silver tongue could convince anyone to go out with him.
meanings.sent5: Her friends warned her about the womanizer's ways, but she was still intrigued.

meanings.definition: One who pursues romantic or sexual relationships with multiple women.
meanings.sent1: The womanizer was always on the lookout for his next conquest.
meanings.sent2: He considered himself a true romantic, even though others saw him as a womanizer.
meanings.sent3: The womanizer's idea of love was having multiple girlfriends at once.
meanings.sent4: To him, being a womanizer meant never settling down with just one woman.
meanings.sent5: His friends teased him about being a womanizer, but he didn't mind the label.
